sentences.sentence: She had snogged a younger Dutch man.
sentences.translation: 她曾亲吻过一个荷兰年轻人。

sentences.sentence: It was only a few years ago that Tony Blair himself came out to his tent, almost snogged the Mad Dog, and proclaimed a new era of cooperation between Britain and Libya .
sentences.translation: 就在几年前，托尼·布莱尔亲自到卡扎菲的帐篷里，几乎是前拥后抱地接近这疯子，还宣布英国和利比亚将开始新一轮的合作。
